ygData.subject: Cabilis faction
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok... I ve been working on faction in Cabilis.. as it was, I could not enter at all before... I m human, and follow the ways of Mithaniel Marr (which made the
ygData.messageBody:
Ok... I've been working on faction in Cabilis.. as it was, I could not enter
at all before... I'm human, and follow the ways of Mithaniel Marr (which made
the basis of my decision of servers, I might add :) , when I started my first
character, my paladin, who also follows mith marr).

Troopers and Crusaders were RtA. Iksar illusion and Benevolance brought either/or
up the Threateningly.

So, I started hunting out outcast iksar in the Field of Bone.. I found that
they gave LegionOfCabilis faction (wasn't sure what that was, think now that
it's the trooper guards?), and BroodOfSomething faction (I think this is Sarnaks?),
but lost faction with TheForsaken... I wasn't too worried about this, as I asked
and was told it was just the iksar outcast (Marauders, manslayers, etc) faction...
but I have heard a few times recently that people believed it was the SK or
necro faction in Cabilis... OUCH. I'm just HOPING this isn't the case.

But, now I have troopers at threateningly with iksar illusion, and dubious with
benevolance... but the crusaders, hierophants, and the banker of course, are
all RtA. I can benevolance them, and I can still get it to threateningly (which
leads me to believe that TheForsaken is NOT their faction, but that's not conclusive),
but then I'm threateningly with both troopers and crusaders... maybe with all
the other residents, not sure. I think I'm dubious with the standard resident
with benevolance on a trooper, but didn't test it with benevolance on a crusader.
So, in theory, as long as I kept moving fast, if everything was threateningly,
I could go through the city safely, as long as I didn't get TOO close to anything,
or stay near them long. But, I'm not going to try that. :)

So, anyone have any more definitive info on this? Also, the banker is RtA,
but way green at 50. Can I still bank with him, assuming he or someone near
doesn't attack me?

Well, that's enough babble from me.

JM - Saidan/Eltanin/Aipex Soulblade
Paladin/Enchanter/Bard 35/50/10
